query.prompt:
This text is written in Norwegian. Create a word table showing the Lemma for each word. The entries in the table are Word, Lemma, Part of Speech, Gender, Number, Tense, Mood and Note.
* Decompose the contraction in Lemma. * Leave blank if not applicable. * Words linked by an apostrophe should be separated. * The Note should be writtern in brief, e.g. archaic. * Quotation marks should be excluded. Apostrophes in contractions are not quotation marks. * If the verb and the other word are combined, they should be separated by Lemma. In such cases, only the verb information should be written in the other columns.
1 Midtveis på vår livsvei 9 vil jeg fortelle om de andre tingene jeg så der. 28 Etter at jeg hadde hvilt min slitne kropp en stund, 67 Han svarte meg: «Ikke et menneske, et menneske var jeg en gang,
query.result: |Word|Lemma|Part of Speech|Gender|Number|Tense|Mood|Note| |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| |Midtveis|midtveis|adverb|||||| |på|på|preposition|||||| |vår|vår|pronoun|||||possessive| |livsvei|livsvei|noun|||||| |vil|ville|verb|||future|indicative|| |jeg|jeg|pronoun|||||| |fortelle|fortelle|verb|||present|infinitive|| |om|om|preposition|||||| |de|de|pronoun|||||| |andre|annen|adjective|||||| |tingene|ting|noun||pl.|||| |jeg|jeg|pronoun|||||| |så|se|verb|||past|indicative|| |der|der|adverb|||||| |Etter|etter|preposition|||||| |at|at|conjunction|||||| |jeg|jeg|pronoun|||||| |hadde|ha|verb|||past|indicative|| |hvilt|hvile|verb|||past|participle|| |min|min|pronoun|||||possessive| |slitne|sliten|adjective|||||| |kropp|kropp|noun|||||| |en|en|indefinite article|||||| |stund|stund|noun|||||| |Han|han|pronoun|m.|sg.|||| |svarte|svare|verb|||past|indicative|| |meg|meg|pronoun|||||| |Ikke|ikke|adverb|||||| |et|en|indefinite article|||||| |menneske|menneske|noun|n.|sg.|||| |et|en|indefinite article|||||| |menneske|menneske|noun|n.|sg.|||| |var|være|verb|||past|indicative|| |jeg|jeg|pronoun|||||| |en|en|indefinite article|||||| |gang|gang|noun||||||
